decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Location Plan. Received 13/06/2017
284 006 A 020 G. Received 25/01/2018
284 006 A 019 G. Received 08/01/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The elevations of the buildings shall be painted in RAL 9010 (upper part) and RAL 1002 (lower part) as shown on the approved drawings and shall remain such thereafter.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until the details and specification of the recreated lintels located over the windows and entrance doors, as shown on the approved drawings, and detailed 1:20 drawings of the position of the lintels in relation to the windows are submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
description: Application of external wall insulation to 49, 51, 57 Worple Avenue
